name: Duraludon
flavorText:
Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both
lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that
it rusts easily.

pokemon.name: Duraludon
pokemon.flavorText:
Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both
lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that
it rusts easily.

pokemon.name: Archaludon
pokemon.flavorText: It gathers static electricity from its surroundings. The beams it launches when down on all fours are tremendously powerful.
